# Shadow (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
This armor blurs the wearer whenever she tries to hide, while also dampening the sound around her, granting a +5 competence bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks. The armorâ€™s armor check penalty still applies normally.

Faint illusion*;* CL 5th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]**,* *[[Silence (Spell)|silence]]**;* Price +3,750 gp.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
